item.title: Reflash a Sonoff S31 to ESPHome
item.description: I like Sonoff hardware, but I prefer to only use devices in my smart home that are fully controllable over my local network. I don’t want things to stop working just because some company is having an outage, or when my internet is down. Because of this, the first thing I do when I get a new Sonoff S31 smart plug is reflash it to รง so I can control it completely locally with Home Assistant without dealing with eWeLink. Here’s how to upgrade your S31 to ESPHome.
